impound.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if the police or law courts impound something you have or own, they keep it until it has been decided that you can have it back
impound.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He sued the police after they impounded his car.
impound.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if the police or law courts impound your possessions, they take them and keep them because a law has been broken
impound.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Courts are authorized to impound any vehicle driven by a person without a valid license.
The courts granted the request to impound all documents relevant to the case.
